column3: Select a journal from the admin journal search page, and click "Edit this journal"

column4: The journal's admin metadata form is opened in a new tab, and the journal labelling section of the form is available to you, with a single option "Subscribe to Open".

column3: Click the "Subscribe to Open" checkbox and then click "Save" on the journal record

column4: The journal record is saved, and the "Subscribe to Open" checkbox is checked.

column3:
Go to the public journals search page

http://testdoaj.cottagelabs.com//search/journals
Search for the journal you just edited

column4: The journal is displayed in the search results with a "Subscribe to Open" label
You are taken to the journal ToC which displays the "Subscribe to Open" label
